cohortName: [PL 254443001] Sjögren's syndrome referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (254443) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 254443002] Sjögren's syndrome referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (254443) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.
Sjogrens Syndrome at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.

cohortName: [PL 254443004] Sjogren's syndrome wtih keratoconjunctivitis sicca at first diagnosis
logicDescription: Sjogrens Syndrome with keratoconjunctivitis sicca at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
